tasks.test: cd cdp-agentkit-core && poetry install --with dev && poetry run make test && cd .. && cd cdp-langchain && poetry install --with dev && poetry run make test && cd .. && cd twitter-langchain && poetry install --with dev && poetry run make test
tasks.build: cd cdp-agentkit-core && poetry install && cd ../cdp-langchain && poetry install && cd ../twitter-langchain && poetry install
tasks.launch: cd cdp-langchain && poetry install && export CDP_API_KEY=<your_cdp_api_key> && poetry run python -m cdp_langchain
